items.label: prop-hypocoercivity-piecewise
items.title: Hypocoercivity for Piecewise Smooth Confining Potentials
items.content:
5426: :label: prop-hypocoercivity-piecewise
5427: 
5428: Let $U: \mathcal{X}_{\text{valid}} \to [0, +\infty]$ be a confining potential satisfying Axiom {prf:ref}`axiom-confining-complete` with:
5429: 1. $U$ is piecewise $C^2$ on the interior
5430: 2. $U = +\infty$ on the boundary $\partial \mathcal{X}$
5431: 3. Coercivity: $\langle x, \nabla U(x) \rangle \geq \alpha_U \|x\|^2 - R_U$ where smooth
5432: 
5433: Then the Langevin dynamics with potential $U$ satisfies hypocoercive exponential convergence:
5434: 
5435: $$
5436: D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_t \| \pi_{\text{kin}}) \leq e^{-\lambda_{\text{hypo}} t} D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_0 \| \pi_{\text{kin}})
5437: $$
5438: 
5439: where:
5440: 
5441: $$
5442: \lambda_{\text{hypo}} = c \cdot \min\left(\gamma, \frac{\alpha_U}{\sigma_v^2}\right)
5443: $$
